verses.roman:
kīrtana-ārambhe prema uthali' calila
nīlācala-vāsī loka dhāñā āila

synonyms: kīrtana-ārambhe—in the beginning of the saṅkīrtana; prema—ecstasy of love; uthali'—overpowering; calila—began to proceed; nīlācala-vāsī—all the residents of Jagannātha Purī; loka—people; dhāñā—running; āila—came.
translation: When the congregational chanting began, ecstatic love immediately overflooded everything, and all the residents of Jagannātha Purī came running.
